reviews.text: Very good architect and neatly managed. But  best part of this place is Security uncle. He gave us a brief knowledge about this place and took us through history of this place. I would like to acknowledge his efforts and dedication towards his service. Awesome man. Keep doing good work Uncle.

Jaswant Thada is super clean and well maintained. Surrounded by the small mounts of hill in which the fort wall runs over. The architecture is unique and have all the details about the forerunner and information about them. Beautiful place to chill and relax from the bustling streets. It have green grass lawn and a small fountain to top the view

This is a beautiful place..
Kept properly and have good vibes there..
It's a cemetery of the king jaswant and the later kings ruling..
They have entry ticket here
From fort u need to walk to the place if you don't have own vehicle...or else the auto..which are really expensive.
Well maintained cenotaph. It is such a serene place. Folk musicians were there who played sensuous rhythm. There is also an option to sit and eat just beside the entrance.
Pretty beautiful for a cremation site..get glimpses of royalty..seems like these people know how to live and also die in style. Architectural beauty.
I don't know how beautiful or scenic this is, it's a private hotel and one is not allowed inside if not on the guest list. That's bad, for a natural beauty.

Not open for common people. Stay away .  Save time and money. The entire place has been taken over by the hotel. The guard informed at the hotel gate that the lake was open quite a while back and is in bad shape now. There is no point visiting it. We came back from the hotel gate, what a waste of time and money.

An Oasis of joy in the middle of a desert. Beautiful gardens, gorgeous rooms and a sense of being detached from time itself. A place that takes you away from it all and helps you to get to know someone that you had not really taken pains to know for some time....yourself.
Nice place between hills, food is delicious
I loved the peace at this place. It is a beautiful place outside the city. There are peacocks and horses too. The staff is friendly.

Life line system of Jodhpur city ....💦💦
Drinking water of hole city is supplied from this lake...⛲⛲
Little beat need of maintenance required near lake area... Peaceful place and best place for boating....
This is the biggest artificial lake in Rajasthan....👈👈
Nice place to spend few hours in the evening. A must visit for tourists.

This is nice place to visit but lack of basic amenities like toilets. Water tank is there. Cleanliness is not maintained at all. Do not expect much from here except the lake and boating. One can enjoy boating here which is Rs 100. Only cash payment accepted here. Camel & hourse riding available here

Nice place, not much published. Very calm and quiet. Always visit in morning or during sunset for most enjoyable experience. During winter glimpse of migratory birds can be observed. Nice parking lot is available to park. But absence of a good cafeteria is there.
Nice place to visit. Boats are also available.

I never seen such restaurant ever in my life. The food was sooooooo classic and tasty. A1 class arrangements here. Space is little bit less but all other facilities are very nice. I like it very very much. I suggest you to visit here once.

Chance to visit first time after nearly 1.5 years spent in jodhpur area. Suggested by my friend, when we saw from outside we all are looking at each other faces and start damn friend which hotel you told to go.

It was a very pleasant surprise when we entered.
Food was so good and tasty in every bit of spoon. So delicious and yummy 😋 waiting for next visit...

It is one of the most popular restaurant in Jodhpur, one of the oldest and most preferred, especially by people who live in the internal city area.
You can visit with family, enjoy great food. Limited variety but wonderful Marwadi taste. You are going to love it.
Best place for lunch and dinner..... fast delivery at table. tasty fry vegetables 👌👌 like to come here again
Tasty food. Fast service. Pocket friendly menu. Good staff.
Simple small
No 5 star

I never seen such restaurant ever in my life. The food was sooooooo classic and tasty. A1 class arrangements here. Space is little bit less but all other facilities are very nice. I like it very very much. I suggest you to visit here once.

It was a very pleasant surprise when we entered.
Food was so good and tasty in every bit of spoon. So delicious and yummy 😋 waiting for next visit...

You can visit with family, enjoy great food. Limited variety but wonderful Marwadi taste. You are going to love it.
Best place for lunch and dinner..... fast delivery at table. tasty fry vegetables 👌👌 like to come here again
Tasty food. Fast service. Pocket friendly menu. Good staff.

Must have experience!

Breakfast with light music & Peacock along with delicious food , fighter planes in sky and Mehangadh fort in background. All this with awesome Rajasthani hospitality makes it a outsiding experience.Staff is very good and go a extra mile to make you feel special.Try Jodhpuri Breakfast option it is very good.
Amazing place must visit
Awesome ambience, excellent staff and a delectable meal with a perfect royal experience. Thanks to Taj team for making my day so special & unforgettable.
Good facilities available

reviews.author_name: Padam Singh Sodha Padam Singh Sodha
reviews.text: Supar
